isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided hash

params._hash: Hash of the data to be signed
params._signature: Signature byte array associated with _hash MUST return the bytes4 magic value 0x1626ba7e when function passes. MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5) MUST allow external calls
